products.title: Lexmark Interpret S405
products.description:
The Lexmark Impact S405 is a wireless, all-in-one inkjet printer designed for printing, copying, scanning, and faxing documents. It offers ultra-fast printing and copying speeds up to 30ppm and 25cpm, in addition to high-quality 1200x2400 dpi scans and fast standalone faxing. It’s in fact the only unit in the entire series to offer faxing. Unfortunately it lacks some of the convenience features on its superior siblings, such as an automatic duplexing and a touchscreen display. There is however an automatic document feeder, but it’s a rather low capacity one. Also included are USB and SD card slots, versatile compatibility (both PCs and Macs), and a 5000 duty cycle.

Features

  • All-in-One HP Thermal Inkjet Printer
  • Print, Scan, Copy Functionalities
  • Maximum 33ppm Black Print
  • Maximum 30ppm Color Print
  • Maximum 25cpm Black Copy
  • Maximum 21cpm Color Copy
  • Maximum 1200x2400dpi, 48-bit Scan
  • Duty Cycle Up to 5000 Pages/Month
  • 2-Line LCD Display
  • ADF Input Tray – 35 Sheets
  • ASF Input Tray – 100 Sheets
  • ADF Output Tray – 35 Pages
  • ASF Output Tray – 25
  • Manual 2-Sided Printing
  • USB Connectivity w/PictBridge
  • 802.11b/g Wireless Networking
  • SD/SDHC/MMC Card Slot
  • Windows/Macintosh Compatibility
  • 1-Year Limited Warranty
  • 2-Year Extended Limited Warranty (Registration Required)

cons.text: if one individual ink cartridge runs out, the entire printer will stop working
paper jams can be very difficult to clear
poor wireless reception - the printer needs to be relatively close to the base station
poor documentation - the included manual isn't very useful when it comes to troubleshooting common printing errors
the required ink cartridges are expensive
